attributes.action: No to Value Added Tax on Health supplements
attributes.additional_details:
The Government want us to get healthy but they are making it harder for the people of this country to do so. Alot of people rely on sport supplements to aid them with training in the gym,football,athletics etc.

I think its an absolute disgrace that the government have added VAT to supplements. If you want British people to become more active Cameron then ban JUNK foods adverts from TV cut the VAT on sports sports supplements and pump more money into grass roots sports and nutrition. SAY NO TO VAT
